Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Iwo amakukakamiza kuti ubweretse chilango msanga. Ndipo zikadakhala kuti nthawi yake siidakhazikitsidwe kale, ndithudi, chilango chikadakhala chitadza kale pa iwo. Ndithudi icho chidzadza pa iwo mwadzidzidzi pamene iwo sali kuchiganizira
Iwo ali kukukakamiza kuti ubweretse chilango. Ndithudi Gahena idzadzadza ndi anthu osakhulupirira
Patsiku limene chilango chidzadza pa iwo kuchokera kumwamba ndi padziko lapansi mawu adzati, “Lawani inu zipatso za ntchito zanu.”
oh inu akapolo anga amene mwakhulupirira! Ndithudi dziko langa lili ndi malo ambiri. Kotero ndipembedzeni Ine ndekha
Mzimu uliwonse udzalawa imfa. Pomaliza nonse mudzabwererakwa Ife

Ndipoiwoameneamakhulupirira ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino, otere tidzawapatsa malo kumwamba amene pansi pake pamayenda mitsinje kuti akhale m’menemo mpaka kale kale. Eti kukoma mphotho ya iwo amene amachita zabwino
Iwo amapirira ndipo amaika chikhulupiriro chawo mwa Ambuye wawo ndi Mtetezi wawo
Kodi zilipo zolengedwa zingati zimene sizisunga chakudya chawo? Ndi Mulungu amene amazidyetsa izo pamodzi ndi inu nomwe. Ndipo Iye ndi wakumva ndi wodziwa

Ndithudi ngati iwe utawafunsa kuti kodi ndani amene adalenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi ndiponso amene adalamula dzuwa ndi mwezi kumvera malamulo ake? Ndithudi iwo adzayankha kuti ndi Mulungu. Nanga ndi chifukwa chiyani iwo amakana choonadi
Mulungu amapereka moolowa manja kwa aliyense amene Iye wamufuna ndipo amamana aliyense amene Iye wamufuna. Ndithudi Mulungu amadziwa chinthu china chilichonse

Ngati iwe ungawafunse kuti kodi ndani amene amagwetsa mvula ndipo amapereka moyo ku nthaka imene idali ya kufa? Ndithudi iwo adzayankha kuti, “Ndi Mulungu.” Nena “Kuyamikidwa konse kukhale kwa Iye.” Iyayi, ambiri a iwo sazindikira
